subject: Re: [junit] SETTING CLASS PATH
msgSnippet: ... Well, without knowing your setup I would suggest this: java -cp . junitfaq.SimpleTest This is not a JUnit problem though.  It sounds like you need to
messageBody:
venkat9985 wrote:

> HI,
> can anyone helps me how to set class path for junit....and how to
> run.....iam able to compile but i cann't run the junit prgm.....iam
> getting the following error..plz help me...
>
>
>
>
> C:\junitfaq>java junitfaq.SimpleTest
> Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:
> junitfaq/SimpleTest
>
> C:\junitfaq>

Well, without knowing your setup I would suggest this:

java -cp . junitfaq.SimpleTest

This is not a JUnit problem though. It sounds like you need to expand
your understanding of classpaths.

--
Jason Rogers

"I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I,
but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in
the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved
me, and gave himself for me."
Galatians 2:20
